messages.body: $AAPL $SPY $VZ    *Reuters* -   'Apple supplier AAC Tech posts first profit drop in four years on weak phone market' https://finance.yahoo.com/news/iphone-parts-supplier-aac-reports-045133514.html

links.title: iPhone parts supplier AAC reports rare fall in quarterly profit
links.description: HONG KONG (Reuters) - AAC Technologies Holdings Inc, an acoustic components supplier to Apple Inc, said on Wednesday quarterly net profit declined for the first time in nearly four years, bruised by a sluggish smartphone market.

links.title: Speculation Rises for New Apple Inc. (AAPL) Watch Models
links.description: As anticipation builds for the launch of Apple Inc's (NASDAQ:AAPL) latest batch of iPhones, intrigue is also beginning to ramp up about what the future holds for another of the tech giant's popular products. A new report indicates that the pipeline for Apple Watch is pretty full.
